content: next st 54 sts finishing row end of working in the round row 1 chain 1 turn single_crochet in front loop of single_crochet place 12 single_crochet around chs add more to look uniform if your chs are loose single_crochet front loop in next 15 scs 12 single_crochet around chs single_crochet front loop in next 15 scs sl st into starting single_crochet tie off sew in ends www ravelry com/designers/chelsey-cocoabe cocoabuttons@gmail com ig cocoabedesigns simple basket abbreviation guide bl = back loop see special stitches on page 2 chain= chain fl = front loop see special stitches on page 2 half_double_crochet= half_double_crochet round= round single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch= slip_stitch st= stitch pattern notes brackets i e 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st 6 times explain what will be worked for a set amount of times repeat the instructions 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next six six times for god did not send his son into the world to condemn the world but to save the world through him john 3 17 www ravelry com/designers/chelsey-cocoabe cocoabuttons@gmail com ig cocoabedesigns
